dns 3.12.001dev
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.smartfrog.services.dns

Interface Summary
DNSBindingIP An interface that defines a DNS IP/hostName binding.
DNSComponent A sub-class of component description that adds specific dns behaviour for parameter checking, linking, and configuration output.
DNSData An interface for a DNS top level component.
DNSDeployerGui Triggers an interaction with the user to select a service instance.
DNSManager A remote interface to interact with the DNS manager.
DNSModifier A remote interface representing an active modification to DNS.
DNSNamed A remote interface to a "named" DNS server that allows to manage it.
DNSOptions An interface for gloabl DNS options.
DNSRecord An interface for a helper class that represents a DNS record that needs to be updated.
DNSService A client interface to a service class registered in DNS, for which we can find a set of instances currently registered.
DNSServiceFilter An interface that a custom filter for service instances should implement.
DNSServiceInstance A "bean like" interface to a service instance.
DNSServiceQuery A query interface to a service class registered in DNS, for which we can find a set of instances currently registered.
DNSView An interface for a DNS view.
DNSZone An interface that defines a DNS Zone.
 

Class Summary
DNSBindingIPImpl A class implementing a DNS binding between host names and IP addresses.
DNSBindNamedImpl A named daemon wrapper for Bind 9.
DNSCollectionImpl Implements a "collection" of components, of possibly different types, that we just want to propagate deployment or actions over them transparently.
DNSComponentDeployerImpl An extension of a Prim deployer to deal with DNS components.
DNSComponentImpl An abstract class that implements the component description interface for dns components.
DNSDataImpl A top level component describing a DNS configuration.
DNSDeployerGuiImpl Triggers an interaction with the user to select a service instance.
DNSDeployerImpl A prim deployer that uses DNS SRV records to locate process compounds.
DNSManagerImpl SmartFrog component to manage a DNS server
DNSModifierImpl SmartFrog component representing an update to the DNS server that could imply adding a new view, zone or binding.
DNSNamedImpl A "generic" named daemon wrapper that has little control over the life-cycle of the daemon, but can check status using a "standard" mechanism.
DNSOpaqueImpl Implements a "opaque" option that we don't know how to interpret but just passes to the DNS options directly.
DNSOptionsImpl A class implementing global options of named.
DNSRecordImpl An abstract class that implements a DNS record to be updated.
DNSServiceBasicFilterImpl A basic filtering scheme based upon exact match of a set of "must-have" attribute-value pairs.
DNSServiceImpl A set of client methods to locate compatible services using DNS SRV records.
DNSServiceInstanceImpl An implementation of a "bean" that contains info of a service instance.
DNSViewImpl A class implementing a DNS view.
DNSVisitor An abstract class to implement the component description visitor pattern.
DNSZoneImpl Implements a "master" or "forward" DNS zone.
 

Exception Summary
DNSException  
DNSModifierException A smartfrog exception that represents a failed DNS config modification.
